data.name: Succubus - Evil Support
data.detailed_description:
Get early access to our special "Madmind Studio" body painting!

NOTE - This bodypainting is included in the basic version of Succubus and it unlocks automatically after about 1 hour of playing.



This DLC allows you to play with "Madmind Studio" body painting right from the start.
The purpose of this add-on is to support the Madmind Studio team that is responsible for creating the Succubus.
If you like the games we create - uncompromising and uncensored, you have the opportunity to support us by purchasing this DLC.

All proceeds from this DLC go directly to the company's employees.

Thank you!

data.short_description: Get early access to special "Madmind Studio" body painting. This content is also included in the base Succubus game.
data.supported_languages:
English*, Polish, Russian, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Korean, Simplified Chinese, Turkish, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-6500, Ryzen 5 1600
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1050, RX 460 (or equivalent with at least 4GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 7 / 8 / 10
  • Processor: i5-8600, Ryzen 5 3400G
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060, RX 5700 (with at least 6GB of memory)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 70 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible
  • Additional Notes: SSD Recommended
